titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation for a general fast throughout the realm of England
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Bill and Christopher Barker ...,

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Whitehall, the seventh day of June in the thirteenth year of our reign."
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
